ops.description: fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:1, type:4, adjust:0});
fadeScreen({r:11, g:0, b:0, speed:0, type:60}); // unused=0
fadeScreen({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:0, type:0}); // unused=0
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:1, adjust:255});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:4, type:1, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:13}); // {Cloud}
“Sephiroth! I know you're listening!
I know what you want to say!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:14}); // {Cloud}
“That I wasn't in Nibelheim five
years ago.”{PAUSE}“That's it, isn't it?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:16}); // {Cloud}
“What you are trying to say is
that you want to confuse me, right?”{PAUSE}“But…even making me see those
things won't affect me.”{PAUSE}“I remember it all.
The heat of the fire…the pain
in my body…and in my heart!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:19}); // {Cloud}
“I don't want to understand.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:20}); // {Cloud}
“But, I want to ask you one thing.
Why…why are you doing this?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:23}); // {Cloud}
“Hojo!?
What does he have to do with me!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:29}); // {Cloud}
“What's wrong, {Tifa}?
I'm not affected by it.”{PAUSE}“…I wasn't paying attention to him.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:35}); // {Cloud}
“Why are you so scared?
Don't worry about me.
I'm all right.”{PAUSE}“No matter how confused I am,
I'll never believe a word
that Sephiroth says.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:36}); // {Cloud}
“It's true that sometimes
I can't figure out who I am.”{PAUSE}“There's a lot of things
muddled up in my memories.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:37}); // {Cloud}
“But, {Tifa}…”{PAUSE}“You said, 'Long time no see,
{Cloud}' right?”{PAUSE}“Those words will always
support me.”{PAUSE}“I am the one you grew up with.
I'm {Cloud} of Nibelheim.”{PAUSE}“No matter how much I lose
faith in myself,
that is the truth.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:38}); // {Cloud}
“That's why you shouldn't be so scared.”{PAUSE}“No matter what anyone else says to me,
it's your opinion that counts…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:40}); // {Cloud}
“What's not?
I'm the same {Cloud} you
grew up with, aren't I?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:57}); // {Cloud}
“I…should be in the picture.”{PAUSE}“Even if I'm not in there, no worry.
This is just an illusory world
Sephiroth made up.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:60}); // {Cloud}
“This picture's a fake.
The truth is in my memory.”{PAUSE}“…Five years ago, I came back to Nibelheim,
to inspect the reactor.
I was sixteen.”{PAUSE}“The town hadn't changed at all.
What did I do? Oh yeah…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:71}); // {Cloud}
“I saw my mom.
I saw the people in town.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:72}); // {Cloud}
“Yeah, I went to {Tifa}'s room.
There, I…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:74}); // {Cloud}
“I looked in the drawers!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:75}); // {Cloud}
“I read the letter addressed
to {Tifa}!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:76}); // {Cloud}
“I spent the night and went
to the reactor in Mt. Nibel.
I was excited about it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:77}); // {Cloud}
“Because that was my first
mission after becoming First Class
in SOLDIER.”
fade({r:255, g:255, b:255, speed:255, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:255, type:5, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:62}); // {Cloud}
“…SOLDIER?
When did I enter SOLDIER?”
fade({r:255, g:255, b:255, speed:255, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:255, type:5, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:64}); // {Cloud}
“How did I join SOLDIER?”
fade({r:255, g:255, b:255, speed:255, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:255, type:5, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:68}); // {Cloud}
“…I didn't have to worry about it,
because I was…”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:4, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:70}); // {Cloud}
“Let's go, {Tifa}.
I'm…I'm all right.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:41}); // {Tifa}
“That's not what I mean…
I don't know how to say it…”{PAUSE}“{Cloud}, I need some time…
Just give me a little time…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:26}); // {Tifa}
“{Cloud}…
Don't listen to him…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:27}); // {Tifa}
“Cover your ears! Close your eyes!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:28}); // {Tifa}
“All that talk of Hojo
constructing you is a lie.”{PAUSE}“Don't we have our
memories together?”{PAUSE}“Being kids together,
starlit nights…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:2}); // {Barret}
“Damn! This was an illusion.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:4}); // {Red XIII}
“We were in an illusion…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:8}); // {Yuffie}
“Oh, a dream!
But it felt so real…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:6}); // {Cait Sith}
“Umm…this was a hallucination.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:12}); // {Cid}
“Damn!
This was all made up.”
fade({r:255, g:255, b:255, speed:255, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:255, type:6, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // Sephiroth
“Ha, ha, ha…”{PAUSE}“I want to take you back to your
real self.”{PAUSE}“The one who gave me the Black Materia
that day…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // Sephiroth
“Who would have ever thought a
failed experiment would prove
so useful?”{PAUSE}“Hojo would die if he knew.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // Sephiroth
“Five years ago you were…”{PAUSE}“…constructed by Hojo, piece by piece,
right after Nibelheim was burnt.”{PAUSE}“A puppet made up of vibrant
Jenova cells, her knowledge,
and the power of the Mako.”{PAUSE}“An incomplete Sephiroth-clone.
Not even given a number.
…That is your reality.”
fade({r:255, g:255, b:255, speed:255, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:255, type:6, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // Sephiroth
“I see you finally understand.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:17}); // Sephiroth
“Oh, is that so?”{PAUSE}“You are just a puppet…
You have no heart…and cannot
feel any pain…”{PAUSE}“How can there be any meaning in the
memory of such a being?”{PAUSE}“What I have shown you is reality.
What you remember,
that is the illusion.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:30}); // Sephiroth
“Ha, ha, ha…{Tifa}…”{PAUSE}“Why are you so worried
and scared by those words?”{PAUSE}“Hmm…Shall I show everyone
here what's in your heart?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:31}); // Sephiroth
“Ha, ha, ha…
You don't look well.”
fade({r:255, g:255, b:255, speed:255, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:255, type:6, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:43}); // Sephiroth
“The ability to change one's looks,
voice, and words, is the power
of Jenova.”{PAUSE}“Inside of you, Jenova
has merged with {Tifa}'s
memories, creating you.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:45}); // Sephiroth
“A boy named {Cloud} might've just
been a part of them.”
fade({r:255, g:255, b:255, speed:255, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:255, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:255, g:255, b:255, speed:255, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:255, type:6, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:47}); // Sephiroth
“Ha, ha, ha…
Think, {Cloud}!”{PAUSE}“…{Cloud}?
Ha, ha, ha…Oh, excuse me.
You never had a name…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:49}); // Sephiroth
“You still don't understand?
Then…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:50}); // Sephiroth
“Do you remember the picture that we
took before we headed for
Mt. Nibel?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:51}); // Sephiroth
“…{Tifa}, you remember, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:52}); // Sephiroth
“But there is no way
he would know.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:53}); // Sephiroth
“Now…what happened to that picture?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:55}); // Sephiroth
“…Do you want to see it?
It turned out pretty good.”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});

dialogStrings:
{Yuffie}
“Oh, a dream!
But it felt so real…”

{Cloud}
“Sephiroth! I know you're listening!
I know what you want to say!”

{Cloud}
“That I wasn't in Nibelheim five
years ago.”{PAUSE}“That's it, isn't it?”

{Cloud}
“What you are trying to say is
that you want to confuse me, right?”{PAUSE}“But…even making me see those
things won't affect me.”{PAUSE}“I remember it all.
The heat of the fire…the pain
in my body…and in my heart!”

Sephiroth
“Oh, is that so?”{PAUSE}“You are just a puppet…
You have no heart…and cannot
feel any pain…”{PAUSE}“How can there be any meaning in the
memory of such a being?”{PAUSE}“What I have shown you is reality.
What you remember,
that is the illusion.”

{Cloud}
“But, I want to ask you one thing.
Why…why are you doing this?”

Sephiroth
“Ha, ha, ha…”{PAUSE}“I want to take you back to your
real self.”{PAUSE}“The one who gave me the Black Materia
that day…”

Sephiroth
“Who would have ever thought a
failed experiment would prove
so useful?”{PAUSE}“Hojo would die if he knew.”

{Cloud}
“Hojo!?
What does he have to do with me!?”

Sephiroth
“Five years ago you were…”{PAUSE}“…constructed by Hojo, piece by piece,
right after Nibelheim was burnt.”{PAUSE}“A puppet made up of vibrant
Jenova cells, her knowledge,
and the power of the Mako.”{PAUSE}“An incomplete Sephiroth-clone.
Not even given a number.
…That is your reality.”

{Tifa}
“All that talk of Hojo
constructing you is a lie.”{PAUSE}“Don't we have our
memories together?”{PAUSE}“Being kids together,
starlit nights…”

{Cloud}
“What's wrong, {Tifa}?
I'm not affected by it.”{PAUSE}“…I wasn't paying attention to him.”

Sephiroth
“Ha, ha, ha…{Tifa}…”{PAUSE}“Why are you so worried
and scared by those words?”{PAUSE}“Hmm…Shall I show everyone
here what's in your heart?”

Sephiroth
“Ha, ha, ha…
You don't look well.”

{Cloud}
“Why are you so scared?
Don't worry about me.
I'm all right.”{PAUSE}“No matter how confused I am,
I'll never believe a word
that Sephiroth says.”

{Cloud}
“It's true that sometimes
I can't figure out who I am.”{PAUSE}“There's a lot of things
muddled up in my memories.”

{Cloud}
“But, {Tifa}…”{PAUSE}“You said, 'Long time no see,
{Cloud}' right?”{PAUSE}“Those words will always
support me.”{PAUSE}“I am the one you grew up with.
I'm {Cloud} of Nibelheim.”{PAUSE}“No matter how much I lose
faith in myself,
that is the truth.”

{Cloud}
“That's why you shouldn't be so scared.”{PAUSE}“No matter what anyone else says to me,
it's your opinion that counts…”

{Cloud}
“What's not?
I'm the same {Cloud} you
grew up with, aren't I?”

{Tifa}
“That's not what I mean…
I don't know how to say it…”{PAUSE}“{Cloud}, I need some time…
Just give me a little time…”

Sephiroth
“The ability to change one's looks,
voice, and words, is the power
of Jenova.”{PAUSE}“Inside of you, Jenova
has merged with {Tifa}'s
memories, creating you.”

Sephiroth
“A boy named {Cloud} might've just
been a part of them.”

Sephiroth
“Ha, ha, ha…
Think, {Cloud}!”{PAUSE}“…{Cloud}?
Ha, ha, ha…Oh, excuse me.
You never had a name…”

Sephiroth
“Do you remember the picture that we
took before we headed for
Mt. Nibel?”

Sephiroth
“But there is no way
he would know.”

Sephiroth
“…Do you want to see it?
It turned out pretty good.”

{Cloud}
“I…should be in the picture.”{PAUSE}“Even if I'm not in there, no worry.
This is just an illusory world
Sephiroth made up.”

{Cloud}
“This picture's a fake.
The truth is in my memory.”{PAUSE}“…Five years ago, I came back to Nibelheim,
to inspect the reactor.
I was sixteen.”{PAUSE}“The town hadn't changed at all.
What did I do? Oh yeah…”

{Cloud}
“…I didn't have to worry about it,
because I was…”

{Cloud}
“I saw my mom.
I saw the people in town.”

{Cloud}
“Yeah, I went to {Tifa}'s room.
There, I…”

{Cloud}
“I spent the night and went
to the reactor in Mt. Nibel.
I was excited about it.”

{Cloud}
“Because that was my first
mission after becoming First Class
in SOLDIER.”
